title: A Letter from a Friend
author: Corwin Lavenoire
summary: A letter from a trusted friend of mine. They requested I check up on an old friend of theirs who they lamented in being unable to come visit themselves. They assured me we would get along quite well, and supposed that I might find something interesting during my visit.
content: To my most trusted confidant,Hello friend! How are you doing? I trust that this letter has found you in good health...
